name: Targus AMB04US Bluetooth Optical Mouse
Features: [Advanced Bluetooth Technology – Eliminates the need for a separate receiver, works seamlessly up to 33-feet away   with a Bluetooth technology enabled PC or Mac. (Depending on environment), Adjustable cursor speed – Change between 1600/800 DPI and adjust cursor speed on the fly; ideal for widescreen laptops, Improved Power Management – Includes sleep mode and on/off switch to extend battery life, RoHS Compliant]
